column5: thats what its all about!!!!!  cheers!
Those are awesome pics Jamie, very nice.  Congrats to your daughter.  Gonna grow up to be like her daddy I see  Joey
Wow, nice pics crazy...geez, she's getting big....just as tall as you now.   Cute kid....you sure she's yours??? Hahahaha Way to go man.
love the report. gotta get her a yak for next year.  i can't wait to take my boy fishing.
Great pics Jamie.  No better fishing than with the little ones when their catchin'!!
Awesome, that smile is priceless.  It'll be a few years before we can take our boy out to catch his first fish, but I can't wait!  Mike
Thanks everyone...  Rico... happens so fast... bought the dora rod and she wanted the 7 foot Abu...  ChrisS... call me, we have to fish this year
And so it begins.....  She caught 'em Jamie, now she just has to hold 'em. lol
Hooray for Bella
Done deal buddy.   Phone call coming soon.  p.s. what's with the Sens jersey on Isabella.   (I got a bruins sweater I can give her.)
great day out today with Bella, she caught her first fish all by herself ( and Number 2,3,4,5 and 6!)  great hour and a half on the water...        ONe proud Dad!
Ohh my goodness, She is adorable.    Great report and the look on her face is priceless.   Thanx for shareing.  Looks like your weather faired much better than ours today.

Congrats to Dad and especially to Bella!  The smiles of a child who catches their first fish are just priceless...it's just pure joy.  Now what I cant figure out is how a cutie like that can be related to you......LOL
We could say the same about you CCMT.......     LOL
Touche...LOL
Great stuff, there's nothing better is there?

Great stuff Jamie ! Wish I was that age again.. and you could take me fishing and show me how to catch'm ! lol  Gonna have to lock that one up in a few years.. the lads will be lined up around the block. Mind you they may just leave her alone if she doesn't change the team she cheers for ! LOL
hey she is Half FLyers Half Sens...
Great stuff jamie your little girl will one day out fish you just remember lol
Beautiful
Now that's what fishing is all about. The big smiles.   Especially from the little ones.
Excellent. Good work Dad
Excellent Jamie!  Pics are priceless!
thanks for the report JAmie, looks like a great time!

Always nice to see the little ones catching fish. Good on you for getting her out.  My youngest got her first fish last summer. A half pound catfish. She asks me to take her fishing all the time now. We wouldn't want to disappoint her, so there will be more fishing in her future. Which means more fishing for me too.
Congrats to your daughter on her first fish and great for you getting her involved.  Mike
Great job Jamie, congrats to your daughter on her first fish.  Beautiful little girl you have there (aside from the jersey of course)
Wow, what a smile!  congrats!
Congrats! Really enjoy seeing all the smiles from the family reports .  now it's time to hook her up with a carp on the barbie rod
That's beautiful Jamie, now you gotta get her tossin Dawgs this summer
A wonderful report Jamie. Congrats to Bella on her fishies.
Great report!  That's one happy girl and one proud Dad!

Funny thing is I had a few pieces of corn on her Dora rod... a huge 30+ pound carp started feeding right around her hook. I had to reel it in.... ( be going back this week for the carp!)  Lew.. I really hope she gets into musky fishing.. then I can buy double the baits
Great report CH.  Can't think of anything better than some family fishing fun.  Congrats

Great Report! Nothing beats the squeels of laughter when they catch a fish. I have a little girl that loves fishing that same spot i think, Manotick? Pm me if you ever want to get the girls together for a fish!
